title: Establishes a person is guilty of grand larceny in the fourth degree when he or she steals property and is in possession of an anti-security item
summary: Establishes a person is guilty of grand larceny in the fourth degree when he or she steals property and is in possession of an anti-security item; makes criminal possession of an anti-security item a class A misdemeanor.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the possession of anti-security items
